titleStmt.title: Maṇimañjarī (Commentary on Bālakāṇḍa of the Rāmāyaṇa)

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This is a commentary on the first section i.e, Bālakāṇḍa of the epic Rāmāyaṇa. It is written by Govindarāja. The author has named separate commentary on each section.
The initial folio of the manuscript are not in order. The second folio of the image 9 in the digitized manuscript is the beginning of the manuscript. The continuation is image 10 folio 2. After the first blank folio on the verso has verses from the 15th chapter of the Bālakāṇḍa and the last line is from the commentary. (line 1) kausalyāyai narapatiḥ pāyasārdhaṃ dadau tadā ardhād ardhaṃ dadau cāpi sumitrāyai narādhipaḥ kaikeyyai cāvaśiṣṭārdhaṃ dadau putrārthakāraṇāt pradadau cāvaśiṣṭārdhaṃ pāyasasyā (line 2) mṛtopamam 1.015.027a anucintya sumitrāyai punar eva mahīpatiḥ evaṃ tāsāṃ dadau rājā bhāryāṇāṃ pāyasaṃ pṛthak ..
(line 6) viṣṇorardhaṃ samnvitau puṣye jātasya bharato minalagne prassannadhiḥ . sārpe jātau ca saumitrī kulirebhyudite ravau .. rāja

msItem.title: Maṇimañjarī (Commentary on Bālakāṇḍa of the Rāmāyaṇa)
msItem.author: Govindarāja

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum Vol. 25 p.25, Vol 18 p. 65

msItem.explicit: [86r 9] mūrtibhedenopamānatvaṃ . atīva atiśayena śuśubhe reje tulyānurāgasyātiśayitakāmasya bhogasamṛddhihetutvāditi bhāvaḥ .
msItem.finalRubric: [86r 9] iti śrīmadrā(marginal [mā]) yaṇabhuṣaṇe bālakāṇḍasyākhyāne maṇi [86v 1] mañjirākhyāne saptasaptatitamassargaḥ
msItem.colophon: śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ sītālakṣmaṇabharataśatrughnahanumatsametaśrīrāmacandraparabrahmaṇe namaḥ . hariḥ oṃ śubamastu śrīnivāsamahāgurave namaḥ

support.p: Guard Leaves are dark brown and fragile. Palm leaves are used as support folio.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 86 written and 3 balnk. Verso of the first blank folio has verses from the 1.015.025-27.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals are used for numbering. 1-86
supportDesc.condition: Good state. faint ink. Edges are slightly broken.

handNote.desc: Initial folio has very small hand writing and last folio has clear and big handwriting.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ in the left margin of the first folio.
120 written with green pencil at the end folio.

binding.p: Guard Leaves are dark brown and fragile.

listBibl.bibl: Srimad Valmiki Ramayana, a critical edition with the commentary of Sri Govindaraja Krishnacharya, T. R Vyasacharya, T R Nirnaya sagar" Press, Bombay 1911

TEI.text:
(1v 1) a (4 akṣara deleted) ya? namaḥ śuklāṃbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇañcaturbhujaṃ . prasannavadanandhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye .. ācāryaṃ śaṭhakopadeśikamatha prācāryapāraṃpārīṃ śrīmallakṣmaṇayogivaryayamunāvāstavyanāthādikān vālmikiṃ sa (1v 2) ha nāradena muninā vākdevatāvalabhaṃ sītālakṣamaṇavāyusunusahitaṃ śrīrāmacandraṃ bhaje . śrīmatyañjanabhūdharasya śikhare śrīmārutessannidhāvagre veṃkaṭanāyakasya sadanadvāre yatikṣmābhṛtaḥ . nānādeśasamāgataiḥ budhagaṇaiḥ rāmāya (1v 3) ṇavyākriyāṃ vistīrṇāṃ racayeti sādaramahaṃ svapne smi sañcoditaḥ .
(86r 9) mūrtibhedenopamānatvaṃ . atīva atiśayena śuśubhe reje tulyānurāgasyātiśayitakāmasya bhogasamṛddhihetutvāditi bhāvaḥ . īti śrīmadrā(marginal [mā]) yaṇabhuṣaṇe bālakāṇḍasyākhyāne maṇi (86v 1) mañjirākhyāne saptasaptatitamassargaḥ śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ sītālakṣmaṇabharataśatrughnahanumatsametaśrīrāmacandraparabrahmaṇe namaḥ . hariḥ oṃ śubamastu .. (at the centre of the folio) śrīnivāsamahāgurave namaḥ ..
